headline: Ocado sees shares plummet after blow from Kroger site closures
summary: Ocado said the move would knock fee revenue by 50 million dollars (£38 million) in 2025-26.

raw.headline: Ocado sees shares plummet after blow from Kroger site closures

headline: Kroger Expands Partnerships with DoorDash, UberEats, Instacart
summary: Kroger said it will book a $2.6 billion charge as it closes some automated facilities and said it expanded partnerships with DoorDash, UberEats and Instacart.

raw.headline: Kroger Expands Partnerships with DoorDash, UberEats, Instacart
raw.summary: Kroger said it will book a $2.6 billion charge as it closes some automated facilities and said it expanded partnerships with DoorDash, UberEats and Instacart.

headline: Ocado slides 20% as US partner Kroger closes robotic warehouses
summary: (Reuters) -Shares in British online supermarket and technology group Ocado slumped on Tuesday ​after U.S. partner Kroger said it would close three automated ‌warehouses in January, dealing a major blow to the Ocado investment story.  Ocado stock was down 20%‌ at 1507 GMT as the group also said its fee revenue will reduce by about $50 million next year as a result of the closures.  "We struggle to see Ocado getting further material partnerships in the U.S. given the failure ⁠of the Kroger partnership,"‌ Bernstein analyst William Woods said.

raw.headline: Ocado slides 20% as US partner Kroger closes robotic warehouses

Ocado stock was down 20%‌ at 1507 GMT as the group also said its fee revenue will reduce by about $50 million next year as a result of the closures.  "We struggle to see Ocado getting further material partnerships in the U.S. given the failure ⁠of the Kroger partnership,"‌ Bernstein analyst William Woods said.

headline: Kroger Evolves eCommerce Offerings to Improve the Customer Experience, Drive Profitable Sales Growth
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR) today announced updates to its eCommerce plan, resulting in a differentiated and simplified customer experience, new households shopping at Kroger, and immediate eCommerce profitability improvements.

raw.headline: Kroger Evolves eCommerce Offerings to Improve the Customer Experience, Drive Profitable Sales Growth
raw.summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR) today announced updates to its eCommerce plan, resulting in a differentiated and simplified customer experience, new households shopping at Kroger, and immediate eCommerce profitability improvements.

headline: WMT Gears Up for Q3 Earnings Release: Buy, Sell or Hold the Stock Now?
summary: Walmart readies for Q3 results as strong store and digital momentum meet cost pressures, leaving investors weighing their next move.
